solution_line_template: That means he has {initial_bars}-{bars_lost_to_taxes}=<<{initial_bars}-{bars_lost_to_taxes}={bars_after_taxes}>>{bars_after_taxes} bars after taxes
So he has {bars_after_taxes}/{divorce_divisor}=<<{bars_after_taxes}/{divorce_divisor}={bars_after_divorce}>>{bars_after_divorce} bars after the divorce
